<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1026) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are trained with [composite longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [composite shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), [glaives](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [longswords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), and [shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [hobgoblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=268) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial hobgoblin weapons are simple weapons and advanced hobgoblin weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline](/Feats.aspx?ID=1033), [Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=1036)
name: Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity
